chunks.text_preview: Windows Hakose Rose Gold. The design pays tribute to Japanese nature. Hakose’s urushi makie dials are fitted in the Seven Windows model. Each timepiece comes with its own Certificate of Authenticity and packed in a hand-made wooden box, wrapped in Minase furoshiki. 18K gold.. Product. The design pay

static_fields.name: Windows Hakose Rose Gold
static_fields.description: The design pays tribute to Japanese nature. Hakose’s urushi makie dials are fitted in the Seven Windows model. Each timepiece comes with its own Certificate of Authenticity and packed in a hand-made wooden box, wrapped in Minase furoshiki. 18K gold.
static_fields.offers.description: The design pays tribute to Japanese nature. Hakose’s urushi makie dials are fitted in the Seven Windows model. Each timepiece comes with its own Certificate of Authenticity and packed in a hand-made wooden box, wrapped in Minase furoshiki. 18K gold.
